Name: Shabti figure
Description: A blue-glazed faience shabti of Pinedjem I of the 21st Dynasty, wearing a long wig with ureaus. The details are outlined in black and it holds a hoe and pick. A single vertical line of text runs down the front of the figure. Pinedjem I was one of the High Priests of Amun who ruled from Thebes while the pharaoh ruled from Tanis in the Delta.
